sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她穿了一件红色的裙子。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chuān le yī jiàn hóngsè de qúnzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle porte une robe rouge.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is wearing a red dress.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这次旅行大大增加了我的见识。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè cì lǚxíng dàdà zēngjiā le wǒ de jiànshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce voyage a grandement augmenté mes connaissances.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This trip has greatly increased my knowledge.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 过年的时候，我们全家人会团聚。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guònián de shíhou, wǒmen quán jiārén huì tuánjù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pendant le Nouvel An, toute notre famille se réunit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: During the New Year, our whole family gathers together.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 妈妈每天做饭给我们吃。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Māma měitiān zuòfàn gěi wǒmen chī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Maman cuisine pour nous chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Mom cooks for us every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他站在我面前，挡住了我的视线。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhàn zài wǒ miànqián, dǎngzhù le wǒ de shìxiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il se tient devant moi et bloque ma vue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is standing in front of me, blocking my view.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège bān yǒu sānshí míng xuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette classe a trente élèves.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This class has thirty students.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ jìnzhǐ tíngchē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est interdit de se garer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Parking is prohibited here.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们应该重视健康问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi zhòngshì jiànkāng wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devrions accorder de l'importance aux problèmes de santé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should attach importance to health issues.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīnjiāng de yángròu chuàn hěn yǒumíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les brochettes d'agneau du Xinjiang sont très célèbres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Xinjiang lamb skewers are very famous.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān duōyún, méiyǒu tàiyáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui il fait nuageux, il n'y a pas de soleil.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today is cloudy, there is no sun.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bùyào dàshēng shuōhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez ne pas parler fort.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please don't speak loudly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ cónglái méiyǒu jiànguò dàhǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'ai jamais vu la mer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have never seen the sea.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Máomáochóng biànchéng le húdié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La chenille s'est transformée en papillon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The caterpillar turned into a butterfly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dǎsuàn míngnián huíguó gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il prévoit de rentrer dans son pays pour travailler l'année prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He plans to return to his country to work next year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo jiē shàng yǒu hěn duō shāngdiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de magasins dans cette rue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many shops on this street.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bù yīhuìr, yǔ jiù tíng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Peu de temps après, la pluie s'est arrêtée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: After a short while, the rain stopped.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 听到这个消息，我感到很高兴。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi, wǒ gǎndào hěn gāoxìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En entendant cette nouvelle, je me suis senti très heureux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hearing this news, I felt very happy.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 西湖是中国最美的湖之一。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīhú shì Zhōngguó zuì měi de hú zhī yī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le lac de l'Ouest est l'un des plus beaux lacs de Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: West Lake is one of the most beautiful lakes in China.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de jiàoxué fāngfǎ hěn yǒuxiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa méthode d'enseignement est très efficace.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her teaching method is very effective.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ zuòyè jiāogěi lǎoshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez remettre les devoirs au professeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please hand in the homework to the teacher.
